name: Assign false value to the isChild variable
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-1-task-7.png)

Create a variable named `isChild`.
Use the keyword ` const`.
Assign a logical value `false` to it.

Related example:
```javascript
const isAdult = true;
```
